General.Name: Capital Securities Corp
General.Description: Capital Securities Corporation provides various financial services in Taiwan and internationally. The company operates through four segments: Asset Management Business, Investment Business, Investment Banking Business, and Retail and Wealth Management Business. It engages in the fixed income and equity investment transaction, debt financing, and NEEQ market making businesses; asset management, private equity investment fund, public offering fund, alternative investment, credit and futures, research, and securities brokerage businesses; and retail and wealth management businesses. The company also provides stock sponsorship and underwriting, bond issuance underwriting, asset securitization, and financial advisory services. Capital Securities Corporation was incorporated in 1988 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: No.156, Minsheng East Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 10596
